quote: It is the power of thought that gives man power over nature. – Hans Christian Andersen
fact: The citrus soda 7-UP was created in 1929; `7` was selected after the original 7-ounce containers and `UP` for the direction of the bubbles.
tip: Use keyboard shortcuts to save time.
joke: Why was ten scared of seven? Because seven ate nine.
